definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: waste away (cf. As. ašašu, moth; Ar. 9u3=un moth(-worm), 9a3=a eat (of moth ; ? denom.); acc. to De:Ps 6:8 al. [[עָשֵׁשׁ]] is denom. from [[עָשׁ]], prop. be moth-eaten, but improb.) ;—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[עָֽשְׁשָׁה מִכַּעַם עֵינִי]] Ps 6:8 my eye is wasted from grief, = Ps 31:10 ([[בְּכַעַס]]; + [[נַפְשִׁי]], [[בִּטְנִי]]; 3 pl. [[עֲחָמַי עָשֵׁ֫שׁוּ]] v:Ps 31:11.
